product_name: L'OrealAge Perfect Cell Renewal Anti-Aging Eye Cream Treatment
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsGive BackL'Oreal Paris Age Perfect Cell Renewal Eye Cream is an anti-aging eye cream treatment targets 5 signs of aging at once, for visibly younger eyes.
details: DetailsBenefitsAnti-Aging Eye Cream with Patented Antioxidant and Vitamin EReveal Millions of New Cells - Visibly Younger EyesDermatologist Tested - Suitable for Sensitive Skin, Allergy TestedPair with NEW Age Perfect Cell Renewal Midnight Serum, preferred to the Number 1 Luxury Night SerumAfter 1 use, the eye area is hydrated and firmer.Key IngredientsVitamin E, an essential nutrient present in the skin, helps to reinforce skin's moisture barrierRecommended by dermatologists, antioxidants help defend skin against damaging external aggressions and boost its natural renewal processFormulated WithoutParabensItem 2586724How To UseApply to clean, dry skin every evening after serum or treatment. Use with Age Perfect Cell Renewal Midnight Serum for even more antioxidant power.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, C15-19 Alkane, Alcohol Denat., Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil / Apricot Kernel Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter / Shea Butter, Dimethicone, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Peg-100 Stearate, Cera Alba / Beeswax / Cire Dabeille, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Silica, Tuber Aestivum Extract, Tuber Melanosporum Extract, Adenosine, Caffeine, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Citric Acid, Lauroyl Lysine, Neohesperidin Dihydrochalcone, Oxothiazolidinecarboxylic Acid, Saccharomyces/Xylinum/Black Tea Ferment, Triethanolamine, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Tocopherol, Octyldodecanol, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Biotin, Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Isohexadecane, Myristic Acid, Peg-20 Stearate, Polysorbate 80, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Citrate, Sorbitan Oleate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tin Oxide, Dimethiconol, Ci 16035 / Red 40, Ci 19140 / Yellow 5, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Salicylate Fil B273026/1.
how_to_use: Apply to clean, dry skin every evening after serum or treatment. Use with Age Perfect Cell Renewal Midnight Serum for even more antioxidant power.
ingredients: Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil / Apricot Kernel Oil

reviews.headline: Game Changer
reviews.comments: This eye cream is definitely a game changer. I have been using this for a couple months now and see the results. I don't have crow feets but have a couple fine lines under my eyes which haven't diminished completely but definitely have soften. Plus, this cream works well under my Tarte concealer. My under eyes look more hydrated. I didn't have bad dark circles but my under eyes look more awake too. I have used so many eye creams over the years and this is the best one I've used. My only complaint like other reviewers is the bottle it comes in. But that's a small price to pay for a cream that actually works.

reviews.headline: Rosacea skin compatible
reviews.comments: This eye cream is nice and does not bother my Rosacea. I have noticed some lines getting lighter. I have not noticed much of a difference with my darks circles however.

reviews.headline: Great Results, But Packaging Needs Improvement
reviews.comments: This eye cream has been a great addition to my skincare routine! It's super gentle on my sensitive skin and provides lasting hydration without feeling greasy. After a couple of weeks, I noticed my under-eyes looked smoother and more awake, with less puffiness. I love the texture and how easily it absorbs. The only downside was the pump—it stopped working halfway through the bottle, which made it harder to get the rest of the product out. Still, the formula itself is wonderful, and I'd definitely repurchase it.

reviews.headline: Pump didn't work, product is ok.
reviews.comments: The pump didn't work, so I had to open up the bottle to access the cream. Beyond that, it's an okay product. It was moisturizing but I didn't see any improvement to my skin.

reviews.headline: Loved the product
reviews.comments: Great product it goes on well and I really like it

reviews.headline: Yummy treat for the Eyes!
reviews.comments:
Love this eye product and have been using it for many years. Does it for me esp when a bit of  eye congestion greats me in the morning. Clears them up and I get the day started.
Easy to apply and creamy but not heavy.

reviews.headline: Pump doesn't work
reviews.comments: Waste of money and time- pump and product dont work.

reviews.headline: Love product but not container
reviews.comments: Great product instantly refreshing under eye area, improves fines lines , great moisture but container and pump suck.

reviews.headline: Nothing Special and the pump stopped working after one month
reviews.comments: I've been an avid user of Kiehl's Avocado Eye Cream, have been using it for the last 15 years and thought I would try something different just to see if there was anything "better".  Big mistake. There is absolutelly nothing special about this product, it's about as basic as you can get. I was really expecting something special, I guess my expectations were just too high. Also annoying that the pump broke after maybe a month of usage. I had to break the top/pump open in order to get the rest of the product out. Will probably just toss it, it's not worth the effort.

reviews.headline: Allergic Reaction
reviews.comments: I wanted to like this product so bad! I tried it after running out of my Olay Ultimate Eye Cream. I had such a bad allergic reaction that I had to put ice on my eyes between clients to help with the swelling! Not sure what it was I reacted to. Thank God Ulta does returns

reviews.headline: deceivingly small amount of actual product
reviews.comments: I have been using this for about 3 weeks and it's completely gone. one tiny pump nightly, or every other night even. I think there's a reason the bottles are so dark, so you can't see how little product there is compared to the relatively large bottle it comes in. I like the product itself but I won't repurchase.

reviews.headline: Eyes are burning and red
reviews.comments:
I bpught this product last week and applied under my eyes 4 times and i saw that the area around my eye is super red and sensitive. Additionally, i was shocked to see that this product has glitter/shimmer in it and i don't see retinol anywhere in the ingredient list which is the main anti-aging ingredient. Very disppointed !!
I would give zero stars if i could, not sure why this product has so many good reviews

reviews.headline: Impressive
reviews.comments: This is a great eye cream. I was really impressed with the immediate lightening of my dark circles. It also worked really well with reducing puffiness and crows feet. Definitely recommend

reviews.headline: I was very hzppy
reviews.comments: It seems to work well is not greasy and can tell a difference for the better thank for my fee sample it's worth buying

reviews.headline: Worthless
reviews.comments: 40 y/o, very diligent of skin care (both body & face). I saw no improvement/difference. If anything I saw the reverse. Didn't last long. The bottle looks nice but waste the product. See pics, the cream hardened daily n the amount is an application, wasted. Drunken Elephant sorry I left you, vitamin C eye cream I'm coming back. My other go to brands No 7. Don't waste your money on this eye cream.

reviews.headline: Great eye cream in a terrible package
reviews.comments:
I've been using this eye cream for a few months, and I love it! Absorbs quickly, doesn't cause my eye makeup to bleed and smear, and keeps my skin plumped and youthful! However, I will echo many comments here about the packaging design. First of all, the black glass makes it impossible for you to see when it's getting low. But most aggravating is that the pump does not twist off (easily) so you can get to the last of the product. I tried several times, bought a replacement bottle, and finally gave it one last time before it went in the garbage. I popped it off! Inside I found plenty of product at the bottom and around the sides of the bottle. I'm here now, a month later, still scooping product out of that bottle with the pump tube as a spatula. SO MUCH WASTED PRODUCT if I hadn't been able to pop it off! 

I'm having a similar issue with my L'Oréal Invisible Lift foundation. Ironically, that bottle is round, and the top WILL NOT TWIST OFF. I can SEE how much product is left, and that's really annoying. Is this L'Oréal's MO? Design the packages so customers buy more frequently instead of giving them access to every drop of product?

I challenge the L'Oréal package design team to come up with something more consumer friendly and less wasteful.

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again.
reviews.comments: Best product I've found for the price.

reviews.headline: I didn't know eye cream could be this good.
reviews.comments: I cry alot and need eye cream for sensitive eyes. I was using Clinique Repair wear Anti-Gravity eye cream  & its 2 yrs old yet, still half-full because I hadn't been using much eye cream or wearing much makeup during the pandemic & Clinique didn't seem to be working well, I liked Daily Eye Benefits however, it had been discontinued years ago. I thought I would try a different brand of eye cream. I tried Estee Lauder night eye cream 2 weeks ago & it irritated my eyes and seemed to cause more wrinkles. I read many positive reviews about one of the L'Oreal Eye Defense creams so, I thought I would try L'Oreal for the first time & the Eye Defense was not in stock at the store. I liked the packaging & the pump container plus it seemed like it would be one of their best eye creams so, I bought it.  As cliche as it sounds...I couldn't believe my eyes...it worked very well & some of my wrinkles almost completely vanished right after I applied it...compared to other some brands that gave me extra wrinkles...its much better than anticipated. Plus it was non-irritating.

media.headline: Nothing Special and the pump stopped working after one month
Horrible coating on the container that rubs off
media.caption: Coating on bottle rubs off, horrible mess!

faceoff_positive.comments: Ended the Paris age, perfect cell renewal, eye cream to her friend after receiving this sample. I truly love the texture and I'm very finicky about the texture of any eye, cream or moisturizers around my eyes. I don't like it to be too occlusive or balmy-it was quite hydrating and gel like. It is said to help with crows feet, dark circles and puffiness. I have not use this product that long, but I have seen a fair amount of contour around the eyelids with crepiness. In my opinion, this is for the ladies that are trying to reduce puffiness and any upper lid creepiness it has amazing antioxidants, which is proven to shield all free radicals and environmental aggressors from that delicate eye area. The hydration is so nice and I'm sure that it comes from the amazing vitamin E ingredient. It does have a very nice ingredient deck as well. One of the top ingredients is glycerin, which is even better than the standard hyaluronic acid. When it comes to hydration, glycerin holds about 4000 times its weight in water and can draw water from the environment and reinforce into the skins layers. It also has adenosine and caffeine, major blood constrictors beneath the surface of the skin to give that firm contoured finish creating less of a puffy/baggy effect. Are use this every morning and every night before I put on my serum and moisturizer.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great formulation

faceoff_negative.comments: The container is horrible for this eye cream!! The coating on the bottle wears off and leaves black pieces of the material that the bottle is coated with. Black splotches were all over my bathroom vanity and I could not figure where this was coming from for a while. Well it was from the bottle mainly the bottom of the bottle. Loreal you need to fix this, juts make it a clear container? The coating on the container comes oof and makes a real mess, and its hard to clean up. As far as the eye cream I not sure yet if it does anything.
faceoff_negative.headline: Horrible coating on the container that rubs off

rollup.name: Age Perfect Cell Renewal Anti-Aging Eye Cream Treatment
